content: change yarn color to brown r16-18 12 single_crochet 3 rounds change yarn color to orange r19-21 12 single_crochet 3 rounds change yarn color to brown r22-24 12 single_crochet 3 rounds change yarn color to orange r25-27 12 single_crochet 3 rounds in r11 crocheted on the blo continue to crochet boot change yarn color to brown using remaining front loop r28-30 12 single_crochet 3 rounds change yarn color to orange r1-5 18 single_crochet r31-33 12 single_crochet 3 rounds embroider shoe laces on the boots with brown yarn arms make 2 details start to crochet with white yarn r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring r2 6 increase 12 r3-7 12 single_crochet 5 rounds r8 1 single_crochet decrease х 4 8 change yarn color to brown r9-21 8 single_crochet 13 rounds stuff fold edges together and single_crochet them leave long tail for assembly designer - diana patskun translated by svitlana pustovit hat work with brown yarn stuff before sewing to the head r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring r2 6 increase 12 r3 1 single_crochet increase х 6 18 r4 2 single_crochet increase х 6 24 r5 blo 24 single_crochet r6-7 24 single_crochet r8 6 single_crochet decrease х 3 21 r9 21 single_crochet r10 5 single_crochet decrease х 3 18 r11 18 single_crochet finish round with slip_stitch make a chain of 3 and crochet 18 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet in each st slip_stitch in the end assembly sew hat to the head previously securing it with pins sew legs and arms embroider mouth nose and scar on the face with black sewing thread bow-tie in magic_ring chain 4 5 treble_crochet chain 4 slip_stitch chain 4 5 treble_crochet chain 4 slip_stitch pull the yarn and wrap it around in the middle of the bow couple times embroider ribbon on the hat with orange yarn designer -
